text: jisake lie vah khud ijaazat ata faramae usake siva koee siphaarish usakee baaragaah mein kaam na aaegee (usake darabaar kee haibat) yahaan tak (hai) ki jab (shifaat ka) hukm hota hai to shifaat karane vaale behosh ho jaate hain phir tab unake dilon kee ghabaraahat door kar dee jaatee hai to poochhate hain ki tumhaare paravaradigaar ne kya hukm diya
